channel.title: When I click Prayer tab I freeze
channel.description:
When I click the prayer tab I freeze and heres the error, [code] Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawInterface(client.java:8511) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2643) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8378) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9190) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:96) at client.run(client.java:5350) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) [/code] I went to all those lines and there apprantly fine but if you know one of those lines is giving me the error I'll take an extra look, thanks. Also!
No scroll bars work how do you fix this? Rep ++ Thanks!

item.title: When I click Prayer tab I freeze
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

Null means something is not found. Make sure you are grabbing the correct Interface ID in the initialize method in Client.java

Read full topic

I went to all those lines and there apprantly fine but if you know one of those lines is giving me the error Iâ€™ll take an extra look, thanks.
